name: RoboHood
description:
Oh no! The robot sisters got lost in medieval times while travelling in time! If they can pass this door, they will be free. At first, only one robot is alive. She must give life to other robots from herself to resurrect them.

Your purpose is to escape from where you are trapped.

Made in GGJ 2020 @ METU

If you are stuck, the video walkthrough is here

Controls

WASD: Movement
Space: Jump
1-2-3-4: Choose robot

Clicking on robots give them lives

Credits

Ahmet Buğra Çetinel (Programming)

Ahmet Kamil Keleş (Programming)

Onur Hayta (3D Art)

Cemre Naz Uyanık (3D Art & Music)
